mapper.select: SELECT m.hour, SUM(m.count) AS count FROM ( SELECT HOUR(data_time) AS hour, COUNT(1) AS count FROM viid_faces WHERE data_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} GROUP BY HOUR(data_time) UNION ALL SELECT HOUR(data_time) AS hour, COUNT(1) AS count FROM viid_persons WHERE data_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} GROUP BY HOUR(data_time) UNION ALL SELECT HOUR(data_time) AS hour, COUNT(1) AS count FROM viid_motor_vehicle WHERE data_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} GROUP BY HOUR(data_time) UNION ALL SELECT HOUR(data_time) AS hour, COUNT(1) AS count FROM viid_non_motor_vehicle WHERE data_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} GROUP BY HOUR(data_time) ) m group by m.hour
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM viid_faces WHERE data_time < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL ${day} DAY)
DELETE FROM viid_persons WHERE data_time < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL ${day} DAY)
